resources.string: Enable this option will help the Emergency number to locate you, in a way to provide you assistance
Customize your Message in a way to help you receiver to identify yourself
Purpose: \n This application made in order to detect if someone falls into the ground

Tutorial: \n Click on the setttings button in order to put the phone number that you want to be informed in case you fall, you can activate gps location also from there click the send_text button to send an sms to the number that you saved click on stop sound to stop the alarm sound click on record data in order to save accelerometer and gyro values to txt files

About permissions: \n This application need permissions for using accelometer and gyro values. These values are processed within the smartphone locally. Additionally, is using GPS coordinates in order to inform the person throught SMS. This application is not connected with the internet
